languages.text: "А если захочешь обмануть меня и сбежать... Найди на улицах людишко в красной одежде с шестерней и печальной рожей. Посмотри, как он подыхает в одиночестве, и некому ему помочь. Ты будешь подыхать так же".

"And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."
languages.original_text: "А если захочешь обмануть меня и сбежать... Найди на улицах людишко в красной одежде с шестерней и печальной рожей. Посмотри, как он подыхает в одиночестве, и некому ему помочь. Ты будешь подыхать так же".

traits.locale_text: "And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

"And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

"And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

"And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

languages.text: “如果你打算对我说谎，或者打算一走了之的话……等你到街上的时候，记得留意一个穿着红衣服、胸前挂着齿轮、满脸痛苦的小人儿。仔细看好他是怎么凄惨地咽气，没人肯帮他。如果你敢耍我，到时候你也会死得这么惨。”
languages.original_text: "And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

traits.locale_text: “如果你打算对我说谎，或者打算一走了之的话……等你到街上的时候，记得留意一个穿着红衣服、胸前挂着齿轮、满脸痛苦的小人儿。仔细看好他是怎么凄惨地咽气，没人肯帮他。如果你敢耍我，到时候你也会死得这么惨。”

languages.text: «Y si piensas en mentirme y huir... cuando salgas a la calle, busca a un humano vestido de rojo con un engranaje en el pecho y cara de sufrimiento. Mira cómo muere en solitario, sin que nadie le ayude. Lo mismo te pasará a ti».
languages.original_text: "And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

traits.locale_text: «Y si piensas en mentirme y huir... cuando salgas a la calle, busca a un humano vestido de rojo con un engranaje en el pecho y cara de sufrimiento. Mira cómo muere en solitario, sin que nadie le ayude. Lo mismo te pasará a ti».

languages.text: 「万が一、俺に嘘をついて逃げようと思うなら…街に出て、赤色の服を着て胸に歯車が埋め込まれ、悲惨な顔をしている人間の男を探すといい。誰にも助けられず、孤独に死にゆく奴の姿を見ろ。貴様も同じ運命をたどることになる」
languages.original_text: "And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

traits.locale_text: 「万が一、俺に嘘をついて逃げようと思うなら…街に出て、赤色の服を着て胸に歯車が埋め込まれ、悲惨な顔をしている人間の男を探すといい。誰にも助けられず、孤独に死にゆく奴の姿を見ろ。貴様も同じ運命をたどることになる」

languages.text: "Und falls Ihr auf den Gedanken kommen solltet, mich zu hintergehen und zu fliehen ... Haltet unterwegs Ausschau nach einem in Rot gekleideten Menschling mit einem Zahnrad auf der Brust und einer schlimmen Elendsmiene. Seht, wie er alleine stirbt, ohne dass ihm jemand hilft. Ihr werdet auf die gleiche Weise sterben."
languages.original_text: "And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

traits.locale_text: "Und falls Ihr auf den Gedanken kommen solltet, mich zu hintergehen und zu fliehen ... Haltet unterwegs Ausschau nach einem in Rot gekleideten Menschling mit einem Zahnrad auf der Brust und einer schlimmen Elendsmiene. Seht, wie er alleine stirbt, ohne dass ihm jemand hilft. Ihr werdet auf die gleiche Weise sterben."

languages.text: « Et si l'idée vous venait de me mentir et de prendre la fuite... Quand vous serez dans la rue, jetez donc un œil à l'humain vêtu de rouge, avec un rouage sur la poitrine et toute la misère du monde sur le visage. Regardez bien comment il agonise sans personne pour l'aider. Votre mort sera identique. »
languages.original_text: "And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

traits.locale_text: « Et si l'idée vous venait de me mentir et de prendre la fuite... Quand vous serez dans la rue, jetez donc un œil à l'humain vêtu de rouge, avec un rouage sur la poitrine et toute la misère du monde sur le visage. Regardez bien comment il agonise sans personne pour l'aider. Votre mort sera identique. »

languages.text: "Yalan söyleyip kaçmayı düşünüyorsan... Sokaklarda dolaşırken gözlerin kırmızı giysili bir insancığı arasın. Göğsünde dişli olacak. Bak bakalım, nasıl bir başına geberip gidiyor. Sen de aynı şekilde ölürsün."
languages.original_text: "And if you think of lying to me and running... When you're on the street, look out for a humanling dressed in red with a cog on his chest and a face full of misery. See how he is dying alone with nobody to help him. Your death will be just the same."

traits.locale_text: "Yalan söyleyip kaçmayı düşünüyorsan... Sokaklarda dolaşırken gözlerin kırmızı giysili bir insancığı arasın. Göğsünde dişli olacak. Bak bakalım, nasıl bir başına geberip gidiyor. Sen de aynı şekilde ölürsün."
